greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least number with the prime signature of prime(n)-1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[Times @@ MapIndexed[(Prime@ First@ #2)^#1 &, #] &@ If[Length@ # == 1 && #[[1, 1]] == 1, {0}, Reverse@ Sort@ #[[All, -1]]] &@ FactorInteger[Prime@ n - 1], {n, 120}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 21 2016 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 19 2016
